sentence.Network_en: The small mote on her forehead distinguishes her from her twin sister.

sentence.Network_en: Young children depend on context to pro - mote memory, and spontaneously report less.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童依靠环境来促进记忆, 而他们能够自然表达出来的较少.

sentence.Network_en: Blower be protected off mote , low noise , avoid mote drop in raw.
sentence.Network_cn: 隔尘、静音风机 、 间绝进入原料尘埃, 确保原料精纯度.
